## Clinical Data

Matching to see how many 7T glucest participants are part of PNC

Load glucest subject list extracted from .xls (list from David 1/13/22)

```{r load glucest}
glucest <- read.csv("7t_dates.csv", header=T) 
names(glucest)
str(glucest)
count(glucest)
```

Loading PNC subject list

``` {r load pnc}
pnc <- read.csv("/Users/megardn/ImageData/PMACS_remote/demographics/n1601_demographics_go1_20161212.csv", header=T)
names(pnc)
str(pnc)
```

join dataframes
```{r join, echo=FALSE}
merge <- inner_join(glucest, pnc,
  by = c("BBLID"="bblid"),
  copy = FALSE,
  keep = FALSE,
  na_matches= "never")
n_distinct(merge$BBLID) #count unique ppts
```
